name: jamesspence/grandiloquent
description: An extension on Laravel's wonderful Eloquent ORM, Grandiloquent seeks to change a few things in the name of greater efficiency. Mainly, these changes entail grouped queries and other, more efficient SQL usage.

suggest.laravel/framework: This framework (specifically Eloquent ORM) is REQUIRED. But you already know that. Why would you download this if you didn't have Eloquent installed?
